group_1.narration: We had to fight Alina Gray again@after we got out of Ai's realm.
But she escaped a second time and@we're still no closer to finding Mami...
Believing that she would be all right,@we decided to return to Mitakihara.

group_1.textRight: Um, Iroha, would it be all right to ask you@one thing?
Do you think that Magical Girls can really@be saved here in Kamihama City?

group_1.narration: If that humanoid Witch that Mami@mentioned is Iroha...
Then she can unleash that Doppel as well.@And that Doppel...
Is proof of how Magical Girls can be freed.@A whole new power given to Magical Girls...
At least, that's what Alina Gray said.@Which means...
Iroha might know something as well...

group_1.textLeft: Well...I honestly can't say for sure.
I don't even know what they mean by saving@Magical Girls.
But what the Wings of the Magius is doing@can't be right...

group_1.textRight: I see...
(Yeah... There's no way it'd be that @simple...)

group_1.textLeft: Are you interested in what they have to say?

group_1.textRight: Oh, no, nothing like that. [chara:200301:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:200301:cheek_0][chara:200301:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:200301:lipSynch_1]I was just@wondering.
(Wait... Iroha somehow reminds me...)

group_1.textCenter: To change your fate, come to Kamihama City.[chara:101500:lipSynch_0][wait:2.0][chara:101500:motion_300][chara:101500:lipSynch_1]@In this town, Magical Girls can be saved.

group_1.textRight: (She looks a little like the girl from that@vision I had...)
Yes, let's go.
Oh, that's right... Madoka, did you call@your parents to tell them you'd be late?

group_1.textLeft: Oh no! I totally forgot to call them!

group_1.textRight: Then we'd better hurry!
Yes, until next time.
(Iroha and that girl do feel similar...)
(Am I imagining it? Or is there a connection@there of some kind?)
What is it?

group_1.textLeft: About earlier, um... I-I'm really sorry!

group_1.textRight: Huh?! What are you talking about?
You've done nothing to apologize for...

group_1.textLeft: You had to fight that Uwasa because I@went to Kamihama...
And even after all that, we still couldn't@bring back Mami...

group_1.textRight: That's not true, Homura!
We found some important clues! And we made@some friends!
Yep, Iroha and the others who fought@alongside us.
Knowing them, they'll help us find Mami@for sure!
I just know she's still alive. Let's come@back to Kamihama to find her!
We couldn't bring Mami back with us, but@the trip wasn't for nothing.
And it's all thanks to you, Homura!
You're always there to save me when I@need help...
Just like today. Thank you for everything!

group_1.textLeft: I-I haven't...@I'm the one who should be...

group_1.textRight: Oh, Homura! The train's coming! Let's run@for it!
